stories.original_summary: Melting ice from West Antarctica once delivered huge amounts of iron to the Southern Ocean, but algae growth did not increase as expected. stories.fantasy_headline: Melting Ice Reveals Tricky Elemental Dust in Southern Sea
stories.fantasy_story: From the Frozen Southern Wastes, ancient ice melts, releasing vital elemental dust into the Great Southern Sea. Our Sages of the Deep once thought this would empower magical kelp, helping purify the waters. But they found the dust was in a form the kelp couldn't easily use, meaning the natural enchantment isn't boosted as hoped.

stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Sages Unveil Artifact to Unlock Secrets of the Soul
stories.fantasy_story: Even the wisest Arcane Sages still ponder how the mind-sphere transforms simple impulses into the very spark of the soul. Now, the Grand Academy of Arcane Arts reveals a powerful new artifact: a focused resonance crystal. This subtle enchantment can touch deep within the mind, promising to unveil the mysteries of inner awareness.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Scriveners Reverse Course: Enchanted Quill to Remain!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Scriveners' Guild had planned to cease support for their beloved Enchanted Quill, an artifact renowned for animating illusions, by the First Day of Spring. However, they have now declared the Quill will remain under perpetual upkeep. It will continue to receive runes of warding and cleansing spells, ensuring its magic endures for all bards and storytellers.
